description: An item that conforms to this schema can be rendered in a sequence
title: An element that can be listed as part of content elements

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

$eref.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
$eref.title: Channel trait

$eref.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

$eref.description: An object for overrides for images when images are used in a gallery. Example usage: Each image in a gallery may have the images own focal point overridden by the gallery.
$eref.title: Has gallery properties

$eref.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
$eref.title: Subtype or Template

$eref.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
$eref.title: Alignment
